iso_eff_area¶

pycraf.conversions.iso_eff_area(freq)[source] [edit on github]¶

Effective antenna area of the ideal (loss-less) isotropic antenna.

Parameters
freqQuantity

Frequency [Hz]

Returns
eff_areaQuantity

Effective antenna area, A_eff [m**2]

Notes

Because all parameters/returned values are Astropy Quantities (see Quantity), unit conversion is automatically performed.
